HDG.QB.content: thinking needed urgently, granted that [if?] an adequate experience of this essence [essence of nihilism] can be prepared only in a responsive thinking [always preparing adequate experience] > essence of nihilism is heal-less (Heil-lose), unique pointer toward salutary [cf. p. 322 w/ hearty greetings] > if thinking to approach (nähern) realm of essence of nihilism, must necessarily become more precursory (vorlaüfiger) & thereby become other [totally other???]

HDG.QB.content: presencing (“being”) always presencing directed toward human essence, presencing as a call (Geheiss) that calls upon human essence > human essence as such is a hearing, belongs to calling of this call, the approach of presencing > that which is the Same (“being”?) each time: belonging together of call & hearing—“What am I saying? It is no longer ‘being’ at all” [beyond Being] > relinquish isolating/separating word “being” just as decisively as name “human being” [can never call human being and being same] [hermeneutic circle leads beyond Being, beyond itself?]

HDG.QB.content: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

HDG.FS.content: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]

HDG.MA.content: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws

HDG.WL.content: way to language: approach more closely language’s own peculiar character (dem Eigentümlichen der Sprache näherzukommen) > here too language shows itself as our way of speaking: attend only to those things, noticed (beachtet) or not, that join/have voice (mitspricht) in language

HDG.OHF.content: defined as Dasein’s own, facticity contains nothing of “ego,” person, “ego-pole,” Aktzentrum ——initial approach (ersten Ansetzen) to “object” of hermeneutical explication must hold fast (halten) to directive (Weisung) co-given in advance in concept of facticity, the possible direction of filling it out (mögliche Erfüllungsrichtung)

HDG.OHF.content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]

HDG.OHF.content: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]

HDG.OHF.content: difficulty of untangling context of tightly woven categories, & demonstrating it in intuition, disappears if (always anew) we “hold to the task of appropriating (aneignet) the corresponding position of looking (entsprechenden Blickstand) at it and holding out in (durchält) this looking […] i.e., staying clear of a certain sedimented customary approach” [guard against (auf der Hut ist) slipping back into it unawares (unversehens)—is Heidegger always this vigilant? is attention given to destruction or to Being?]
